4.text: Masters in Politics & Media at the University of East Anglia

8.text:
Doing a Masters in Politics & Media at UEA
is special, it's special because there aren't

14.text:
many places where you can actually bring together
the study of politics and the study of media

19.text:
in a single school, and that way you get a
flavour of that relationship that is essential

23.text:
to both. Politics & Media are inseparable
and should be studied like it. This school

28.text:
has quite a unique view on looking at all
aspects of media and the way it relates to

33.text:
society and culture and because of that we
draw on expertise from a range of fields including

39.text:
media law, public policy, journalism, gender
studies, cultural studies. All our our media

45.text:
courses are interdisciplinary, that means
that apart from the core modules, they are

51.text:
bringing media and politics together. The
students have a lot of choice. I can select

56.text:
the modules that I'm really interested in.
We teach through a variety of methods, sometimes

62.text:
lectures, sometimes small study groups, sometimes
workshops. The aim is always to be very interactive.

68.text:
Every student in the school has their own
personal advisor and this means they have

72.text:
someone who they can turn to whenever they're
struggling, perhaps with essay writing or

76.text:
personal issues that they want to talk through.
We've also got the too-difficult box which

80.text:
encourages us to go and hear public speakers
and politicians discussing the difficult issues

86.text:
of our time. Students also have the opportunities
to take part in our study trips to visit the

92.text:
European Commission, the headquarters of NATO.
they also have the chance to have face to

98.text:
face interaction with Media practitioners,
journalists and politicians. Most people who

103.text:
study Media at University level want to know
they're going to be able to get a job in the

107.text:
media at some stage, so they can come here
and do an academic degree but they have the

111.text:
chance to do a little bit of practical work
while they're here which really enhances their
